entry.title: Formally Introducing Finatra 2.0: "the Fast, Testable Scala Services Framework That Powers Twitter."
entry.content:
Please check out our post on the TwitterEng blog formally introducing Finatra 2.0:

https://blog.twitter.com/2015/finatra-20-the-fast-testable-scala-services-framework-that-powers-twitter

Finatra Release 2.1.2 is now available from Maven Central.

There are lots of improvements in this release. Please checkout the v2.1.2 release tag on github for more information.

As always, you can download the release from Maven Central.

See the Finatra Github page or checkout our new User Guide for more information on getting started.

– The Finatra Team
